====== DESCRIPTION ======

Call for entries to UNBOUND Vol IX, the 9th annual juried exhibit of unique works exploring what a book can beâ€¦ art using â€˜the bookâ€™ as a material or format. Presented by ArtisTree Gallery in conjunction with the Bookstock Literary Arts Festival in Woodstock, VT. Open to all 2D, 3D, installation, assemblage, film and video artists who are working in New England or New York. Juror: TBA. Cash prizes awarded.
For complete details and online entry form, visit-
https://artistreevt.org/submit-your-work-unbound-vol-ix.html
Submission Deadline: June 28


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

All entries should be submitted through our website where you can find our online entry form as well as complete submission instructions and details.
https://artistreevt.org/submit-your-work-unbound-vol-ix.html
Submission Deadline: June 28, 2019

entry.title: 5/31 - Artists Choose Artists 2019
entry.content:
Parrish Art Museum
ğŸ“ Water Mill, NY, United States
ğŸ¨ All Visual Arts
ğŸ“… 05/31/2019 deadline
ğŸ’° $20.00 fee
â¡ Apply


====== DESCRIPTION ======

Open Call for artists working in all media and residing on the East End of Long Island in zip code areas beginning with the digits 119.

Artists Choose Artists is the Parrish Art Museumâ€™s triennial exhibition that highlights the dynamic relationships among the multi-generational artist community of Long Islandâ€™s East End. Artists Choose Artists is designed to catalyze creative networks and encourage mentorship and conversations between artists at varying stages in their careers.

Seven notable artists of the region will jury the exhibition. Each juror selects two artists based on submissions and subsequent studio visits. The exhibition will comprise the work of the seven jurors and the fourteen artists and may include painting, sculpture, photography, prints, and mixed media. The 2019 Jurors are: Lillian Ball, Ralph Gibson, Valerie Jaudon, Jill Moser, Alexis Rockman, Lucien Smith, and Allan Wexler.

Applications are accepted via SlideRoom until May 31, 2019.


===== INSTRUCTIONS =====

Applications are accepted via SlideRoom until May 31, 2019. The application can be accessed here: https://parrishart.slideroom.com
